alert.note: Alert for Benton; Lafayette; Marshall; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:51PM CDT until June 11 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lafayette County in northwestern Mississippi... North central Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Benton County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 651 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wall Doxey State Park, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Albany, Wall Doxey State Park, Ecru, New Harmony, Etta, Bethlehem, Pinedale, Hickory Flat, Potts Camp, Myrtle, Malone, Shari, Hortontown, Poolville, Waterford, Cherry Creek, Old Myrtle, Pumpkin Center, Lake Center and Baker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
